Instruction: Heat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
Beat together eggs, flour, milk, salt, vanilla extract, and cinnamon in a bowl until well combined; set aside.
Melt butter in a 9x11-inch baking dish in the preheated oven, being careful not to burn it, for about 5 minutes. Then pour the prepared batter into the dish.
Bake the pancake in the oven until it has puffed up and the center is no longer moist, usually takes about 20 to 25 minutes.
